recipe.title: Black Olive Spread
ingredients: 1 cup pitted Niçoise or Kalamata olives
2 tablespoons chopped fresh oregano leaves or 1/2 teaspoon dried oregano
instructions: Combine all of the ingredients in a food processor and, pulsing the machine on and off, process until they are just pureed. The spread should retain a bit of texture. Store, covered, in the refrigerator, up to a week.
